refsect2.title: bonobo_file_selector_open ()
refsect2.programlisting: char* bonobo_file_selector_open (GtkWindow *parent, gboolean enable_vfs, const char *title, const char *mime_types, const char *default_path);
refsect2.para: Creates and shows a modal open file dialog, waiting for the user to select a file or cancel before returning.

listitem.simpara: optional window the dialog should be a transient for.
if FALSE, restrict files to local paths.
optional list of mime types to provide filters for. These are of the form: "HTML Files:text/html|Text Files:text/html,text/plain"
the URI (or plain file path if enable_vfs is FALSE) of the file selected, or NULL if cancel was pressed.

refsect2.title: bonobo_file_selector_open_multi ()
refsect2.programlisting: char** bonobo_file_selector_open_multi (GtkWindow *parent, gboolean enable_vfs, const char *title, const char *mime_types, const char *default_path);
refsect2.para: Creates and shows a modal open file dialog, waiting for the user to select a file or cancel before returning.

listitem.simpara: optional window the dialog should be a transient for
if FALSE, restrict files to local paths.
optional list of mime types to provide filters for. These are of the form: "HTML Files:text/html|Text Files:text/html,text/plain"
a NULL terminated string array of the selected URIs (or local file paths if enable_vfs is FALSE), or NULL if cancel was pressed.

refsect2.title: bonobo_file_selector_save ()
refsect2.programlisting: char* bonobo_file_selector_save (GtkWindow *parent, gboolean enable_vfs, const char *title, const char *mime_types, const char *default_path, const char *default_filename);
refsect2.para: Creates and shows a modal save file dialog, waiting for the user to select a file or cancel before returning.

listitem.simpara: optional window the dialog should be a transient for
if FALSE, restrict files to local paths.
optional list of mime types to provide filters for. These are of the form: "HTML Files:text/html|Text Files:text/html,text/plain"
optional file name to default to
the URI (or plain file path if enable_vfs is FALSE) of the file selected, or NULL if cancel was pressed.
